page_content:
WELCOME
Welcome to lululemon’s inaugural 
Impact Report. In 2020, we released  
our Impact Agenda which set out  
a broad vision and plan to help 
transform our industry and create  
a healthier world. This Impact  
Report demonstrates how we  
are working toward that.
2
 LULULEMON IMPACT REPORT 2020
Introduction   Be Human   Be Well   Be Planet   Impact Supplement
